sentences.en: Taking a ride on the hormonal roller-coaster means lots of changes—and a lot of common worries—for both guys and girls.
sentences.cn: 坐荷尔蒙过山车意味着许多变化——我们都有共同的担忧——无论是对于男孩还是女孩。

sentences.en: Some of the teens had changed to one particular gene—the glucocorticoid receptor (GR)—that helps regulate the body's hormonal response to stress.
sentences.cn: 一些青少年已经转换了一个特定的基因——糖皮质激素受体（GR）——帮助调节体内荷尔蒙对于压力的反应。

sentences.en: A newer hormonal intervention used in Europe is use of GnRH analogs such as nafarelin or buserelin.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲使用的一种较新的激素干预措施是使用 GnRH 类似物，如那法林或乙基酰胺。
